articles.title: Epidemiological Update on Monkeypox - Pan American Health Organization
articles.description: Between 1 January and 7 July 2022, a total of 7,892 confirmed cases, including three deaths, were reported from 63 Member States in five World Health Organization (WHO) Regions. The 3 fatal cases were reported from Nigeria (1) and the Central African Republic…

articles.title: Hundreds of passengers impacted as Aer Lingus cancels 11 more flights to Spain, France and America - RSVP Live
articles.description: The cancellations include flights to Spain, France and America, and a number of different reasons have been given as airports reach breaking point across Europe
articles.content:
Aer Lingus has cancelled 11 more flights today and tomorrow as airlines and airports across Europe continue to be impacted by disruption caused by a number of contributing factors.

articles.title: Dozens of people line up for monkeypox vaccine in NYC - Daily Mail
articles.description: Gay or bisexual men who have multiple sexual partners over two weeks are again being offered the jab in America's monkeypox capital, alongside anyone exposed to the disease.
articles.content:
Dozens of people lined up for vaccines against monkeypox in New York City Friday as the city launched its second jabbing drive.
